content: --रूढ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having an etymological as well as a special or conventional meaning (said of a word); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} the word पंकज etymologically means ‘anything produced in mud’, but in usage or popular convention it is restricted to some things only produced in mud, such as the lotus; <ab>cf.</ab> the word आतपत्र or ‘parasol’.
